actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to convey certain lands to the city of Fayetteville, Georgia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to convey specifically described lands, without consideration or assessment of cost, to the city of Fayetteville, Georgia.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to convey certain lands to the city of Fayetteville, Georgia.
